SQUASH.DESCRIPTION: Voted the world's healthiest sport by Forbes Magazine, squash is a very effective way to burn lots of calories, build muscles, increase fitness and lose weight. On top of this, squash is competitive and you can have lots of fun. Over 20 million people play it worldwide. So what are you waiting for? Get moving and start playing squash!

SQUASHINCJ.DESCRIPTION1: We gladly notice the embrace of the community towards squash in Cluj-Napoca, in Romania, together with the rest of Europe and the social character that comes with this sport. At this point I am pleased to notice that squash is on an ascending trend, more and more young people are keen to practice it for pleasure or professional level.
SQUASHINCJ.DESCRIPTION2: Along with men, more and more women come to practice squash, knowing that they can burn more that 1200 calories per hour. Having a strong social component, squash is easy to learn and brings you one hour of relaxation that is great for body toning. In Cluj, the squash community is constantly growing. Local and national competitions are organized on a regular basis by the squash clubs, for different skill levels.
SQUASHINCJ.SEBIQUOTE: In 2017 Romanian Open Squash is part of the PSA (Professional Squash Association) World Tour calendar. This is a huge achievement for of our local and national squash image.

CLUBS.BURNTEXT1: A variety of professional and custom made courts await you and your friends. Heavy sweating, good mood and good night sleep are guaranteed afterwards. Beyond competition and practice, an important aspect for each of the clubs is the social part.
CLUBS.BURNTEXT2: That is why in a weekly or bi-weekly format there are league or challenger matches, where the get-together part is the most important one. Drop by, mingle with the great and passionate people, where the main topic is squash. All clubs offer a large variety of professional equipment and accessories, as well as the well-deserved cold water after the game.

SCCJ.TITLE: Squash Club Cluj-Napoca
SCCJ.DESCRIPTION: The oldest and biggest club in Cluj, founded in 2011 with 4 WSF approved professional courts. Monthly local tournaments are organized for beginner and advanced players. The club will be also the home of several national competitions.

ST.TITLE: SquashTech
ST.DESCRIPTION: You can still smell the fresh parquet. The club opened in May 2017. Two professional, WSF approved courts are waiting you. Local competitions are oeganized weekly. The opening of the 2017/2018 Romanian National season was held here.

SIT.TITLE: Squash IT
SIT.DESCRIPTION: The club opened its doors in 2015 and hosted several matches of the Romanian Open Squash that year. Three custom made courts are available for the clients. As usual, water and rackets are provided free, good workout is guaranteed.

COACHES.TITLE: Coaches
COACHES.DESCRIPTION: Meet the coaches near you and get the right direction, instructions from the first sessions, so you can fully enjoy the beauty of this sport.

MIKI.NAME: Micky PushSquash
MIKI.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
MIKI.DESCRIPTION: He started playing squash in Oradea where in that time, was one of the few courts in the country. Best national ranked player of the club and also the head coach in Cluj-Napoca. Micky is working full time with children and adults, beginners and advanced players, dedicating 100% of his time studying and teaching this sport.

SIMI.NAME: Simion Lupșan
SIMI.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
SIMI.DESCRIPTION: Active player, paricipating at national competitions and also active coach, Simion is one of the coaches who started playing when the first club opened in Cluj. His passion for squash is limitless, all the time up to date with the latest news. As a result of his calm manner, his specialty is coaching children, but not only.

MANU.NAME: Emanuel Mărcuș
MANU.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
MANU.DESCRIPTION: First certified coach from Cluj, he has been mentor and an example for many players. Emanuel is active at local and national tournaments as well. His unique style of play describes also his coaching. He is working with beginners as well as with advanced players.

CALIN.NAME: Călin Codarcea
CALIN.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
CALIN.DESCRIPTION: With 5-years experience, Călin trains juniors and adults of all levels. Besides being the co-organizer of the most important tournament in the country, Romanian Open Squash and promoter of PSA Romanian Open, he is also an active player and also participated in specialized camps for players and coaches in Belgium, Poland and Hungary.

LACI.NAME: László Feischmidt
LACI.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
LACI.DESCRIPTION: His passion towards this sport started in 2014. Active player since then, he managed to get in the top 15 of the national rankings. Working with children and adults, beginners and advanced, he is trying to make this tough sport and game feel as 'easy' as it looks.

VALI.NAME: Valentin Chindriș
VALI.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
VALI.DESCRIPTION: 17 when he first played squash and right away he found the passion for it. He always enjoyed teaching others to play and also managed to get the Level 1 WSF coaching certificate. His coaching model is adapted to each student in order to help them reach their goals.

BARBU.NAME: Barbu Câmpean
BARBU.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
BARBU.DESCRIPTION: He stepped for the first time into a squash court in Bucharest, in 2005. Participation for the first edition of Cluj Cup, lit the fire. Camps with coaches and well known players followed, as well as trainings, tournament participations. Currently he plays and trains all ages and categories.

LAJOS.NAME: Lajos Almási
LAJOS.TITLE: WSF Level 1 Coach
LAJOS.DESCRIPTION: Squash player since 2013, multiple participant at regional and national competitions. Level 1 certified WSF coach since 2016, with activity at the AquAngar squash court in Cehu Silvaniei.

FUTURE.TITLE: Future projects for our community
FUTURE.DESCRIPTION: We are continuously focusing on the fun and competitive part of squash which fuels desire. Any suggestion is welcomed, we are building things for the growing community. Share your ideas with us to create a more friendly and effective environment. Some topics on which we are already working:

RANKINGS.TITLE: Local Rankings
RANKINGS.DESCRIPTION: See up to date, real time rankings for all competitions - beginners, advanced.

EVENTCALENDAR.TITLE: Event Calendar
EVENTCALENDAR.DESCRIPTION: See upcoming events and plan your next event goals and start preparations.

NEWS.TITLE: News
NEWS.DESCRIPTION: All the updates you need to know about squash from your town.

PROFILES.TITLE: Player Profiles
PROFILES.DESCRIPTION: Create your own profile, challenge others, see your achievements.

EVENTREGISTRATION.TITLE: Event Registrations
EVENTREGISTRATION.DESCRIPTION: Easily register and unregister from local events. Invite friends, check opponents.

COACHING.TITLE: Coaching
COACHING.DESCRIPTION: Go to the next level. Get your periodic tips from coaches, stay in touch.

FOOTER.TITLE: PRO SQUASH Romania
FOOTER.PROSQUASH: In 2012 we started our mission to build a squash community in Cluj-Napoca and Romania and to make this visible on the continent. Our vision is to remain the pomoter of the biggest squash open tournament from Romania, Romanian Open Squash by bringing year after year the best players from all around the world.

MIRCEA.NAME: Mircea Babă
MIRCEA.TITLE: PRO SQUASH Romania player
MIRCEA.QUOTE: Creating a digital platform for our community is one of the best initiatives this year. It will be a long process but surely it will be worth of the investment.

PAUL.NAME: Paul Miheț
PAUL.TITLE: PRO SQUASH Romania player
PAUL.QUOTE: On the court you are alone, but outside we are united and only together we can come up with great ideas for the future, for squash in Cluj-Napoca.

MESSAGES.ROBOT: Are you sure you are not a robot?
